Is something like this what you are after?
```function index_fields(nt::NamedTuple, I)
    indexed_values = getindex.(values(nt), Ref(I))
    return NamedTuple{keys(nt)}(indexed_values)
end```

Can't you just use `map`?
```julia> nt = (a=1, b=2)
(a = 1, b = 2)

julia> map(x -> 2x, nt)
(a = 2, b = 4)```
